notes: [Fixed] Fixed a bug with the `formatExifDate` Twig filter.
[Improved] Updated getID3 to v1.9.14.
[Improved] The plugin now requires PHP 5.4+.
[Fixed] Fixed performance issues on asset index tables
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where moving assets into another folder didn’t refresh Asset Metadata fields with the “Auto-refresh field on every element save” option enabled.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the `formatExifGpsCoordinates` filter was throwing exceptions for certain files.
[Added] The plugin now includes the following Twig filters from the [Helpers](https://github.com/carlcs/craft-helpers) plugin: `unitPrefix`, `fractionToFloat` and `floatToFraction`.
[Improved] Twig errors that might occur when rendering values for subfields are now logged in the assetmetadata.log file.
[Improved] Warnings and errors from getID3 are now logged in the assetmetadata.log file.
[Improved] Updated getID3 to the latest commit (52483a2).
[Fixed] The search index is now updated correctly with the content of the asset metadata.
[Improved] Fields set to “read-only” are now grayed out a bit.
[Added] Added Composer support
[Added] Added a refresh button to the field type.
[Added] Added a setting to auto-refresh the field on every element save.
[Added] Added a setting to make field read-only.
[Improved] Maximum amount of data downloaded to analyse remote files can now be configured. Partially downloaded files can be padded to match the original files size.
[Added] Added support for remote sources.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where the Asset index view didn't load.
[Added] Added Craft 2.5 plugin configurations.
[Added] Added an Asset Metadata field type to extract and store metadata from an asset on element save.
[Improved] getID3 can now be configured from the plugin's assetmetadata.php configuration file.
First release
